itchio.desc: Solo game dev! Currently developing "ADC". Check out my itch page to play some of my games!!!

github.desc: My Github profile, where most of my projects are stored. I use it like a 'secondary' portfolio.

backloggd.desc: In here I keep a backlog of the games that I've played: AAA games, indies... Comes with reviews aswell!

bluesky.desc: Mainly used for consuming content and talking about some stuff that I find interesting. (You should follow me...)

bandcamp.desc: I'm planning on touching the world of music sometime in the near future! For now, you can check the music I listen to.

lastfm.desc: Also a platform where you can check what I listen to, barely used, as I scrobble on the background usually.

discord.desc: My discord is "@lumiug", add me if you'd like to have a chat. Click on this to join my dev server.

steam.desc: Obsessed with rhythm, puzzles and platformer games. 'Have you heard of that new Indie Game?' Yep, already played it.

youtube.desc: I used to make videos in the past. Right now this is only for archival purposes until I decide to come back.

fiverr.desc: I do Origin commissions here! Right now it's paused as I don't have the need to do them again.

twitter.desc: Discontinued account. Follow me on Bluesky instead!
